participant_1.background:
I've been at my current job for 3 years.
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell.
my major was american literature and education.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.

participant_2.background:
I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest.
i am an army ranger.
i work part time in the campus library.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Good! I am happy to have some time off on this rainy day. How about you?
I am doing well! I am at home with my kids, who are playing video games. It is a good excuse for me to practice my music.
That sounds like fun! What kind of music do you like to play?
I play guitar and sing. I mostly play classic rock, but I also enjoy country music.
That is awesome! I used to play the guitar, but I haven't played in a long time. I miss it.
You should pick it back up! It is a great way to relax and de-stress.
I might just do that! Thanks for the inspiration.
You're welcome! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the casino, go shopping, or just relax at home.
Those sound like fun things to do! I like to go to the casino too, but I don't win very often.
Me neither! But it is still fun to try.
I agree! It is always fun to have a little bit of excitement.
Yes, it is! Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Yes, I am going to go to the casino with my friends. We are going to have a lot of fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you have a great time.
Thank you! I am sure I will.
You're welcome! Have a good day!
